attributes.action: Kick start mental health support, programs and treatment straight away.
attributes.additional_details: The Government needs to step in now to help save lives from mental health self harm and suicide. The way things are going, the U.K. will see a worse knock on effect from this than the pandemic as a whole. It’s getting out of hand!
attributes.background: The Government needs to get more mental health support, programs and treatment started straight away. People have been waiting 18-24 months for any kind of contact or support. This is an endemic within a pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222
